subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Will the Steinbrenner family still need Howard J. Rubenstein to be his master’s filtered voice now that Hank Steinbrenner’s has emerged as the blunt voice of the Yankees?
snippet: Will the Steinbrenner family still need Howard J. Rubenstein to be his master’s filtered voice now that Hank Steinbrenner’s has emerged as the blunt voice of the Yankees?
